fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 214.11 lakh crore compared with Rs 120.54 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 43.10 points or 0.24% to settle at 17,721.50. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 3.82% to 14.1250. Adani Enterprises, Ambuja Cements and RIL were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
